name: ZP BETTER TOGETHER, LLC
description: Provides Sign-Language Interpreters for Video Relay Service
govEntities: Office of the Vice President of the United States
sampleDescriptions: Pursue urgent need for federal support for at-home interpreting stations and equipment to enable remote interpreting services for the deaf and hard of hearing during COVID-19 pandemic.
